Hack the Vote 🇺🇸

Saturday - October 24, 2015

1 minute read ∙ 119 words

0 Comments

Check out the app at rcodonnell.github.io/code4hr-voting

“Change the world, know your candidate.”

🔨 with ♥️ at the Hack to Help Hampton Roads Hackathon from October 23–24, 2015 at Dominion Enterprises.

Screenshots

TODO: [gallery type=“rectangular” size=“full” ids=“3152,3160,3158” ]

Installation & Setup

  • Run the following commands to build the app.
$ cd path/to/repo
$ grunt

Now head over to https://localhost:9001

Testing

This command can be used run unit tests with karma.

$ grunt test

Contributing

To get started…

  • 🔃 Create a new pull request using https://github.com/Code4HR/code4hr-voting/.

Technologies Used

  • Angular.js
  • Moment.js
  • Google Civic Information API
  • Google Maps API
  • GitHub Pages
  • Grunt
  • Bootstrap/HTML/CSS/jQuery/Font Awesome

Team

Corey O’Donnell Galina Tsoy Mark Carter

Chris Bliss Joshua Harris FVCproductions

GitHub Repo

View the project at github.com/rcodonnell/code4hr-voting.
